alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 14 at 10:10AM PST until January 15 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Monica Mountains and Santa Clarita Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds. This includes Interstate 5 and Highways 14 and 126, and canyons roads, such as Kanan, Malibu Canyon, Topanga, and Decker Canyon Roads. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty Santa Ana winds could linger into Sunday and this advisory may need to be extended.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
